title: Limits enforcement for agent execution
overview:
Implement configurable limits for max iterations, max duration, max budget USD, and no-progress threshold to prevent runaway agent execution or excessive costs.

**Motivation:** Prevents resource waste and cost overruns from agent tasks that hang or loop indefinitely.

**Success criteria:**
- max_iterations stops loop after limit
- max_duration_hours stops loop after time limit
- max_budget_usd warns when exceeded
- no_progress_threshold stops after no changes
- Limits configurable per implementation

**Signals:** priority: medium
